Pokedex Entry: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.
Name: Bulbasaur

Pokedex Entry: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this POKéMON will fiercely peck at any intruder.
Name: Pidgeotto

Pokedex Entry: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.
Name: Pidgey

Pokedex Entry: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.
Name: Beedrill

Pokedex Entry: Almost incapable of moving, this POKéMON can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.
Name: Kakuna

Pokedex Entry: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.
Name: Weedle

Pokedex Entry: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.
Name: Butterfree

Pokedex Entry: This POKéMON is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.
Name: Metapod

Pokedex Entry: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
Name: Caterpie

Pokedex Entry: A brutal POKéMON with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.
Name: Blastoise

Pokedex Entry: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.
Name: Wartortle

Pokedex Entry: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.
Name: Squirtle

Pokedex Entry: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.
Name: Charizard

Pokedex Entry: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.
Name: Charmeleon

Pokedex Entry: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.
Name: Charmander

Pokedex Entry: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.
Name: Venusaur

Pokedex Entry: It electrifies its claws and tears its opponents apart with them. Even if they dodge its attack, they’ll be electrocuted by the flying sparks.
Name: Zeraora

Pokedex Entry: It slithers toward people. Then, without warning, it triggers the explosion of its own head. It’s apparently one kind of Ultra Beast.
Name: Blacephalon

Pokedex Entry: It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one appears to be made up of many life-forms stacked one on top of each other.
Name: Stakataka

Pokedex Entry: It stores hundreds of liters of poisonous liquid inside its body. It is one of the organisms known as UBs.
Name: Naganadel

Pokedex Entry: This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to be chosen as a first partner in its own world.
Name: Poipole

Pokedex Entry: Able to conceal itself in shadows, it never appears before humans, so its very existence was the stuff of myth.
Name: Marshadow

Pokedex Entry: This artificial Pokémon, constructed more than 500 years ago, can understand human speech but cannot itself speak.
Name: Magearna

Pokedex Entry: Reminiscent of the Ultra Beasts, this life-form, apparently asleep underground, is thought to have come from another world in ancient times.
Name: Necrozma

Pokedex Entry: It has gobbled mountains and swallowed whole buildings, according to reports. It’s one of the Ultra Beasts.
Name: Guzzlord

Pokedex Entry: This Ultra Beast came from the Ultra Wormhole. It seems not to attack enemies on its own, but its sharp body is a dangerous weapon in itself.
Name: Kartana

Pokedex Entry: It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. Witnesses observed it flying across the sky at high speed.
Name: Celesteela

Pokedex Entry: One of the mysterious life-forms known as Ultra Beasts. Astonishing electric shocks emanate from its entire body, according to witnesses.
Name: Xurkitree

Pokedex Entry: One of the dangerous Ultra Beasts, it has been spotted running across the land at terrific speeds.
Name: Pheromosa

Pokedex Entry: This Ultra Beast appeared from another world. It shows off its body, but whether that display is a boast or a threat remains unclear.
Name: Buzzwole

Pokedex Entry: One of several mysterious Ultra Beasts. People on the street report observing those infested by it suddenly becoming violent.
Name: Nihilego

Pokedex Entry: It is said to be a female evolution of Cosmog. When its third eye activates, away it flies to another world.
Name: Lunala

Pokedex Entry: It is said to live in another world. The intense light it radiates from the surface of its body can make the darkest of nights light up like midday.
Name: Solgaleo

Pokedex Entry: Motionless as if dead, its body is faintly warm to the touch. In the distant past, it was called the cocoon of the stars.
Name: Cosmoem

Pokedex Entry: The dense fog it creates brings the downfall and destruction of its confused enemies. Ocean currents are the source of its energy.
Name: Tapu Fini

Pokedex Entry: Its body is gaseous and frail. It slowly grows as it collects dust from the atmosphere.
Name: Cosmog

Pokedex Entry: It pulls large trees up by the roots and swings them around. It causes vegetation to grow, and then it absorbs energy from the growth.
Name: Tapu Bulu

Pokedex Entry: This guardian deity of Akala is guilelessly cruel. The fragrant aroma of flowers is the source of its energy.
Name: Tapu Lele

Pokedex Entry: This guardian deity of Melemele is brimming with curiosity. It summons thunderclouds and stores their lightning inside its body.
Name: Tapu Koko

Pokedex Entry: When it spots enemies, it threatens them by jingling the scales on its tail. Weak opponents will crack and flee in panic.
Name: Kommo-o

Pokedex Entry: It leaps at its prey with a courageous shout. Its scaly punches tear its opponents to shreds.
Name: Hakamo-o

Pokedex Entry: It expresses its feelings by smacking its scales. Metallic sounds echo through the tall mountains where Jangmo-o lives.
Name: Jangmo-o

Pokedex Entry: Swinging its massive anchor, it can KO Wailord in a single blow. What appears to be green seaweed is actually its body.
Name: Dhelmise

Pokedex Entry: It has a compassionate personality, but if it is angered, it completely destroys its surroundings with its intense breath.
Name: Drampa

Pokedex Entry: When it unleashes its psychic power from the protuberance on its head, the grating sound of grinding teeth echoes through the area.
Name: Bruxish

Pokedex Entry: Its actual appearance is unknown. A scholar who saw what was under its rag was overwhelmed by terror and died from the shock.
Name: Mimikyu

Pokedex Entry: The spiny fur on its back is normally at rest. When this Pokémon becomes agitated, its fur stands on end and stabs into its attackers.
Name: Togedemaru

Pokedex Entry: The shell on its back is chemically unstable and explodes violently if struck. The hole in its stomach is its weak point.
Name: Turtonator

Pokedex Entry: It is born asleep, and it dies asleep. All its movements are apparently no more than the results of it tossing and turning in its dreams.
Name: Komala

Pokedex Entry: Originally making its home in the ozone layer, it hurtles to the ground when the shell enclosing its body grows too heavy.
Name: Minior

Pokedex Entry: Its trust in its partner is what awakens it. This Pokémon is capable of changing its type, a flexibility that is well displayed in battle.
Name: Silvally

Pokedex Entry: The heavy control mask it wears suppresses its intrinsic capabilities. This Pokémon has some hidden special power.
Name: Type: Null

Pokedex Entry: It lives in shallow seas, such as areas near a beach. It can eject its internal organs, which it uses to engulf its prey or battle enemies.
Name: Pyukumuku

Pokedex Entry: Possessed people controlled by this Pokémon transformed its sand mound into a castle. As it evolved, its power to curse grew ever stronger.
Name: Palossand

Pokedex Entry: Born from a sand mound playfully built by a child, this Pokémon embodies the grudges of the departed.
Name: Sandygast

Pokedex Entry: With a flashing slash of its giant sharp claws, it cleaves seawater—or even air—right in two.
Name: Golisopod

Pokedex Entry: This Pokémon is a coward. As it desperately dashes off, the flailing of its many legs leaves a sparkling clean path in its wake.
Name: Wimpod

Pokedex Entry: They form groups of roughly 20 individuals. Their mutual bond is remarkable—they will never let down a comrade.
Name: Passimian

Pokedex Entry: Known for its extreme intelligence, this Pokémon will look down on inexperienced Trainers, so it’s best suited to veteran Trainers.
Name: Oranguru

Pokedex Entry: It attaches flowers to its highly nutritious vine. This revitalizes the flowers, and they give off an aromatic scent.
Name: Comfey

Pokedex Entry: Its long, striking legs aren’t just for show but to be used to kick with skill. In victory, it shows off by kicking the defeated, laughing boisterously.
Name: Tsareena

Pokedex Entry: The sepals on its head developed to protect its body. These are quite hard, so even if pecked by bird Pokémon, this Pokémon is totally fine.
Name: Steenee

Pokedex Entry: A delectable aroma pours from its body. They are often swallowed whole by Toucannon lured by that wafting deliciousness.
Name: Bounsweet

Pokedex Entry: This immensely dangerous Pokémon possesses overwhelming physical strength. Its habitat is generally off-limits.
Name: Bewear

Pokedex Entry: Despite its adorable appearance, when it gets angry and flails about, its arms and legs could knock a pro wrestler sprawling.
Name: Stufful

Pokedex Entry: For some reason, only females have been found. It creates a reverse harem of male Salandit that it lives with.
Name: Salazzle

Pokedex Entry: It burns its bodily fluids to create a poisonous gas. When its enemies become disoriented from inhaling the gas, it attacks them.
Name: Salandit

Pokedex Entry: Forests where Shiinotic live are treacherous to enter at night. People confused by its strange lights can never find their way home again.
Name: Shiinotic

Pokedex Entry: It scatters spores that flicker and glow. Anyone seeing these lights falls into a deep slumber.
Name: Morelull

Pokedex Entry: It requires a lot of effort to maintain Lurantis’s vivid coloring, but some collectors enjoy this work and treat it as their hobby.
Name: Lurantis

Pokedex Entry: During the day, it sleeps and soaks up light. When night falls, it walks around looking for a safer place to sleep.
Name: Fomantis

Pokedex Entry: It delivers headbutts with the water bubble on its head. Small Pokémon get sucked into the bubble, where they drown.
Name: Araquanid

Pokedex Entry: It crawls onto the land in search of food. Its water bubble allows it to breathe and protects its soft head.
Name: Dewpider

Pokedex Entry: It spits a mud that provides resistance to both wind and rain, so the walls of old houses were often coated with it.
Name: Mudsdale

Pokedex Entry: The mud stuck to Mudbray’s hooves enhances its grip and its powerful running gait.
Name: Mudbray

Pokedex Entry: Toxapex crawls along the ocean floor on its 12 legs. It leaves a trail of Corsola bits scattered in its wake.
Name: Toxapex

Pokedex Entry: It plunges the poison spike on its head into its prey. When the prey has weakened, Mareanie deals the finishing blow with its 10 tentacles.
Name: Mareanie

Pokedex Entry: When it’s in trouble, its eyes moisten and begin to shine. The shining light attracts its comrades, and they stand together against their enemies.
Name: Wishiwashi

Pokedex Entry: Its quick movements confuse its enemies. Well equipped with claws and fangs, it also uses the sharp rocks in its mane as weapons.
Name: Lycanroc

Pokedex Entry: It’s considered to be a good Pokémon for beginners because of its friendliness, but its disposition grows rougher as it grows up.
Name: Rockruff

Pokedex Entry: It rolls up pollen into puffs. It makes many different varieties, some used as food and others used in battle.
Name: Ribombee

Pokedex Entry: It feeds on the nectar and pollen of flowers. Because it’s able to sense auras, it can identify which flowers are about to bloom.
Name: Cutiefly

Pokedex Entry: It beats its wings together to create fire. As it moves in the steps of its beautiful dance, it bathes opponents in intense flames.
Name: Oricorio

Pokedex Entry: It aimed for the top but got lost and ended up on a snowy mountain. Being forced to endure the cold, this Pokémon evolved and grew fur.
Name: Crabominable

Pokedex Entry: While guarding its weak points with its pincers, it looks for an opening and unleashes punches. When it loses, it foams at the mouth and faints.
Name: Crabrawler

Pokedex Entry: It zips around, on sharp lookout for an opening. It concentrates electrical energy within its large jaws and uses it to zap its enemies.
Name: Vikavolt

Pokedex Entry: Its body is capable of storing electricity. On camping trips, people are grateful to have one around.
Name: Charjabug

Pokedex Entry: Its strong jaw enables it to scrape trees and slurp out the sap. It normally lives underground.
Name: Grubbin

Pokedex Entry: When it finds a trace of its prey, it patiently stakes out the location...but it’s always snoozing by nightfall.
Name: Gumshoos

Pokedex Entry: With its sharp fangs, it will bite anything. It did not originally live in Alola but was imported from another region.
Name: Yungoos

Pokedex Entry: When it battles, its beak heats up. The temperature can easily exceed 212 degrees Fahrenheit, causing severe burns when it hits.
Name: Toucannon

Pokedex Entry: It eats berries and stores their seeds in its beak. When it encounters enemies or prey, it fires off all the seeds in a burst.
Name: Trumbeak

Pokedex Entry: It can peck at a rate of 16 times a second to drill holes in trees. It uses the holes for food storage and for nesting.
Name: Pikipek

Pokedex Entry: It controls its water balloons with song. The melody is learned from others of its kind and is passed down from one generation to the next.
Name: Primarina

Pokedex Entry: A skillful dancer, it creates a sequence of water balloons as it dances, and briskly bombards its enemies.
Name: Brionne

Pokedex Entry: This Pokémon snorts body fluids from its nose, blowing balloons to smash into its foes. It’s famous for being a hard worker.
Name: Popplio

Pokedex Entry: This Pokémon has a violent, selfish disposition. If it’s not in the mood to listen, it will ignore its Trainer’s orders with complete nonchalance.
Name: Incineroar

Pokedex Entry: At its throat, it bears a bell of fire. The bell rings brightly whenever this Pokémon spits fire.
Name: Torracat

Pokedex Entry: While grooming itself, it builds up fur inside its stomach. It sets the fur alight and spews fiery attacks, which change based on how it coughs.
Name: Litten

Pokedex Entry: It fires arrow quills from its wings with such precision, they can pierce a pebble at distances over a hundred yards.
Name: Decidueye

Pokedex Entry: A bit of a dandy, it spends its free time preening its wings. Its preoccupation with any dirt on its plumage can leave it unable to battle.
Name: Dartrix

Pokedex Entry: This wary Pokémon uses photosynthesis to store up energy during the day, while becoming active at night.
Name: Rowlet

Pokedex Entry: It lets out billows of steam and disappears into the dense fog. It’s said to live in mountains where humans do not tread.
Name: Volcanion

Pokedex Entry: This troublemaker sends anything and everything to faraway places using its loop, which can warp space.
Name: Hoopa

Pokedex Entry: A sudden transformation of Carbink, its pink, glimmering body is said to be the loveliest sight in the whole world.
Name: Diancie

Pokedex Entry: When the Kalos region’s ecosystem falls into disarray, it appears and reveals its secret power.
Name: Zygarde

Pokedex Entry: When this legendary Pokémon’s wings and tail feathers spread wide and glow red, it absorbs the life force of living creatures.
Name: Yveltal

Pokedex Entry: Legends say it can share eternal life. It slept for a thousand years in the form of a tree before its revival.
Name: Xerneas

Pokedex Entry: They fly around on moonless nights and attack careless prey. Nothing can beat them in a battle in the dark.
Name: Noivern

Pokedex Entry: They live in pitch-black caves. Their enormous ears can emit ultrasonic waves of 200,000 hertz.
Name: Noibat

Pokedex Entry: Its ice-covered body is as hard as steel. Its cumbersome frame crushes anything that stands in its way.
Name: Avalugg

Pokedex Entry: It blocks opponents’ attacks with the ice that shields its body. It uses cold air to repair any cracks with new ice.
Name: Bergmite

Pokedex Entry: Singing in eerie voices, they wander town streets on the night of the new moon. Anyone who hears their song is cursed.
Name: Gourgeist

Pokedex Entry: The pumpkin body is inhabited by a spirit trapped in this world. As the sun sets, it becomes restless and active.
Name: Pumpkaboo

Pokedex Entry: It can control trees at will. It will trap people who harm the forest, so they can never leave.
Name: Trevenant

Pokedex Entry: These Pokémon are created when spirits possess rotten tree stumps. They prefer to live in abandoned forests.
Name: Phantump

Pokedex Entry: These key collectors threaten any attackers by fiercely jingling their keys at them.
Name: Klefki

Pokedex Entry: This very friendly Dragon-type Pokémon will hug its beloved Trainer, leaving that Trainer covered in sticky slime.
Name: Goodra

Pokedex Entry: It drives away opponents by excreting a sticky liquid that can dissolve anything. Its eyes devolved, so it can’t see anything.
Name: Sliggoo

Pokedex Entry: The weakest Dragon-type Pokémon, it lives in damp, shady places, so its body doesn’t dry out.
Name: Goomy

Pokedex Entry: Born from the temperatures and pressures deep underground, it fires beams from the stone in its head.
Name: Carbink

Pokedex Entry: Its whiskers serve as antennas. By sending and receiving electrical waves, it can communicate with others over vast distances.
Name: Dedenne

Pokedex Entry: Although its body is small, its proficient fighting skills enable it to keep up with big bruisers like Machamp and Hariyama.
Name: Hawlucha

Pokedex Entry: It sends a soothing aura from its ribbonlike feelers to calm fights.
Name: Sylveon

Pokedex Entry: The diamond-shaped crystals on its body expel air as cold as -240 degrees Fahrenheit, surrounding its enemies and encasing them in ice.
Name: Aurorus

Pokedex Entry: This ancient Pokémon was restored from part of its body that had been frozen in ice for over 100 million years.
Name: Amaura

Pokedex Entry: Thanks to its gargantuan jaws, which could shred thick metal plates as if they were paper, it was invincible in the ancient world it once inhabited.
Name: Tyrantrum

Pokedex Entry: This Pokémon was restored from a fossil. If something happens that it doesn’t like, it throws a tantrum and runs wild.
Name: Tyrunt

Pokedex Entry: They flare their frills and generate energy. A single Heliolisk can generate sufficient electricity to power a skyscraper.
Name: Heliolisk

Pokedex Entry: They make their home in deserts. They can generate their energy from basking in the sun, so eating food is not a requirement.
Name: Helioptile

Pokedex Entry: Their enormous claws launch cannonballs of water powerful enough to pierce tanker hulls.
Name: Clawitzer

Pokedex Entry: They knock down flying prey by firing compressed water from their massive claws like shooting a pistol.
Name: Clauncher

Pokedex Entry: Their poison is strong enough to eat through the hull of a tanker, and they spit it indiscriminately at anything that enters their territory.
Name: Dragalge

Pokedex Entry: Camouflaged as rotten kelp, they spray liquid poison on prey that approaches unawares and then finish it off.
Name: Skrelp

Pokedex Entry: When they evolve, two Binacle multiply into seven. They fight with the power of seven Binacle.
Name: Barbaracle

Pokedex Entry: Two Binacle live together on one rock. When they fight, one of them will move to a different rock.
Name: Binacle

Pokedex Entry: It wields the most compelling hypnotic powers of any Pokémon, and it forces others to do whatever it wants.
Name: Malamar

Pokedex Entry: Opponents who stare at the flashing of the light-emitting spots on its body become dazed and lose their will to fight.
Name: Inkay

Pokedex Entry: It can distinguish the faintest of scents. It puts its sensitive sense of smell to use by helping pastry chefs in their work.
Name: Slurpuff

Pokedex Entry: To entangle its opponents in battle, it extrudes white threads as sweet and sticky as cotton candy.
Name: Swirlix

Pokedex Entry: It devises various scents, pleasant and unpleasant, and emits scents that its enemies dislike in order to gain an edge in battle.
Name: Aromatisse

Pokedex Entry: It emits a scent that enraptures those who smell it. This fragrance changes depending on what it has eaten.
Name: Spritzee

Pokedex Entry: Generations of kings were attended by these Pokémon, which used their spectral power to manipulate and control people and Pokémon.
Name: Aegislash

Pokedex Entry: When Honedge evolves, it divides into two swords, which cooperate via telepathy to coordinate attacks and slash their enemies to ribbons.
Name: Doublade

Pokedex Entry: Apparently this Pokémon is born when a departed spirit inhabits a sword. It attaches itself to people and drinks their life force.
Name: Honedge

Pokedex Entry: When in danger, it raises its ears and releases enough psychic power to grind a 10-ton truck into dust.
Name: Meowstic

Pokedex Entry: The organ that emits its intense psychic power is sheltered by its ears to keep power from leaking out.
Name: Espurr

Pokedex Entry: Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes it more elegant but also increases the swiftness of its movements.
Name: Furfrou

Pokedex Entry: Although it possesses a violent temperament, it won’t put up with bullying. It uses the leaf in its mouth to sense the movements of its enemies.
Name: Pangoro

Pokedex Entry: It does its best to be taken seriously by its enemies, but its glare is not sufficiently intimidating. Chewing on a leaf is its trademark.
Name: Pancham

Pokedex Entry: It can tell how its Trainer is feeling by subtle shifts in the grip on its horns. This empathic sense lets them run as if one being.
Name: Gogoat

Pokedex Entry: Thought to be one of the first Pokémon to live in harmony with humans, it has a placid disposition.
Name: Skiddo

Pokedex Entry: It claims exquisite flower gardens as its territory, and it obtains power from basking in the energy emitted by flowering plants.
Name: Florges

Pokedex Entry: It draws out and controls the hidden power of flowers. The flower Flabébé holds is most likely part of its body.
Name: Flabébé

Pokedex Entry: It flutters around fields of flowers and cares for flowers that are starting to wilt. It draws out the hidden power of flowers to battle.
Name: Floette

Pokedex Entry: The male with the largest mane of fire is the leader of the pride.
Name: Pyroar

Pokedex Entry: The stronger the opponent it faces, the more heat surges from its mane and the more power flows through its body.
Name: Litleo

Pokedex Entry: Vivillon with many different patterns are found all over the world. These patterns are affected by the climate of their habitat.
Name: Vivillon

Pokedex Entry: It lives hidden within thicket shadows. When predators attack, it quickly bristles the fur covering its body in an effort to threaten them.
Name: Spewpa

Pokedex Entry: When under attack from bird Pokémon, it spews a poisonous black powder that causes paralysis on contact.
Name: Scatterbug

Pokedex Entry: In the fever of an exciting battle, it showers embers from the gaps between its feathers and takes to the air.
Name: Talonflame

Pokedex Entry: From its beak, it expels embers that set the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on the bewildered prey that pop out of the grass.
Name: Fletchinder

Pokedex Entry: These friendly Pokémon send signals to one another with beautiful chirps and tail-feather movements.
Name: Fletchling

Pokedex Entry: With their powerful ears, they can heft boulders of a ton or more with ease. They can be a big help at construction sites.
Name: Diggersby

Pokedex Entry: They use their large ears to dig burrows. They will dig the whole night through.
Name: Bunnelby

Pokedex Entry: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.
Name: Greninja

Pokedex Entry: It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.
Name: Frogadier

Pokedex Entry: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.
Name: Froakie

Pokedex Entry: It gazes into the flame at the tip of its branch to achieve a focused state, which allows it to see into the future.
Name: Delphox

Pokedex Entry: It has a twig stuck in its tail. With friction from its tail fur, it sets the twig on fire and launches into battle.
Name: Braixen

Pokedex Entry: Eating a twig fills it with energy, and its roomy ears give vent to air hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit.
Name: Fennekin

Pokedex Entry: Its Tackle is forceful enough to flip a 50-ton tank. It shields its allies from danger with its own body.
Name: Chesnaught

Pokedex Entry: It relies on its sturdy shell to deflect predators’ attacks. It counterattacks with its sharp quills.
Name: Quilladin

Pokedex Entry: The quills on its head are usually soft. When it flexes them, the points become so hard and sharp that they can pierce rock.
Name: Chespin

Pokedex Entry: Over 300 million years ago, it was feared as the strongest of hunters. It has been modified by Team Plasma.
Name: Genesect

Pokedex Entry: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.
Name: Meloetta

Pokedex Entry: By blasting water from its hooves, it can glide across water. It excels at using leg moves while battling.
Name: Keldeo

Pokedex Entry: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.
Name: Kyurem

Pokedex Entry: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as “The Guardian of the Fields.”
Name: Landorus

Pokedex Entry: Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.
Name: Zekrom

Pokedex Entry: This Pokémon appears in legends. It sends flames into the air from its tail, burning up everything around it.
Name: Reshiram

Pokedex Entry: Countless charred remains mar the landscape of places through which Thundurus has passed.
Name: Thundurus

Pokedex Entry: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.
Name: Tornadus

Pokedex Entry: This Pokémon fought humans in order to protect its friends. Legends about it continue to be passed down.
Name: Virizion

Pokedex Entry: This Pokémon came to the defense of Pokémon that had lost their homes in a war among humans.
Name: Terrakion

Pokedex Entry: This legendary Pokémon battled against humans to protect Pokémon. Its personality is calm and composed.
Name: Cobalion

Pokedex Entry: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona’s fire provided a replacement for the sun.
Name: Volcarona

Pokedex Entry: This Pokémon was believed to have been born from the sun. When it evolves, its entire body is engulfed in flames.
Name: Larvesta

Pokedex Entry: This brutal Pokémon travels the skies on its six wings. Anything that moves seems like a foe to it, triggering its attack.
Name: Hydreigon

Pokedex Entry: After it has eaten up all the food in its territory, it moves to another area. Its two heads do not get along.
Name: Zweilous

Pokedex Entry: It tends to bite everything, and it is not a picky eater. Approaching it carelessly is dangerous.
Name: Deino

Pokedex Entry: They attack in groups, covering themselves in steel armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.
Name: Durant

Pokedex Entry: It breathes through a hole in its tail while it burns with an internal fire. Durant is its prey.
Name: Heatmor

Pokedex Entry: It makes a nest out of bones it finds. It grabs weakened prey in its talons and hauls it to its nest of bones.
Name: Mandibuzz

Pokedex Entry: Its wings are too tiny to allow it to fly. As the time approaches for it to evolve, it discards the bones it was wearing.
Name: Vullaby

Pokedex Entry: They fight for their friends without any thought about danger to themselves. One can carry a car while flying.
Name: Braviary

Pokedex Entry: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.
Name: Rufflet

Pokedex Entry: Their fluffy fur absorbs damage, even if they strike foes with a fierce headbutt.
Name: Bouffalant

Pokedex Entry: It leads a group of Pawniard. It battles to become the boss, but will be driven from the group if it loses.
Name: Bisharp

Pokedex Entry: Blades comprise this Pokémon’s entire body. If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on stones by the river.
Name: Pawniard

Pokedex Entry: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.
Name: Golurk

Pokedex Entry: The energy that burns inside it enables it to move, but no one has yet been able to identify this energy.
Name: Golett

Pokedex Entry: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move.
Name: Druddigon

Pokedex Entry: It wields the fur on its arms like a whip. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot even be seen.
Name: Mienshao

Pokedex Entry: In fights, they dominate with onslaughts of flowing, continuous attacks. With their sharp claws, they cut enemies.
Name: Mienfoo

Pokedex Entry: Its skin is very hard, so it is unhurt even if stepped on by sumo wrestlers. It smiles when transmitting electricity.
Name: Stunfisk

Pokedex Entry: When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to prevent dehydration, it wraps itself in many layers of thin membrane.
Name: Accelgor

Pokedex Entry: When attacked, it defends itself by closing the lid of its shell. It can spit a sticky, poisonous liquid.
Name: Shelmet

Pokedex Entry: When its body temperature goes up, it turns into steam and vanishes. When its temperature lowers, it returns to ice.
Name: Cryogonal

Pokedex Entry: It can make its breath freeze at will. Very able in the water, it swims around in northern seas and catches prey.
Name: Beartic

Pokedex Entry: When it is not feeling well, its mucus gets watery and the power of its Ice-type moves decreases.
Name: Cubchoo

Pokedex Entry: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. They challenge foes with tusks that can cut steel.
Name: Haxorus

Pokedex Entry: Since a broken tusk will not grow back, they diligently sharpen their tusks on river rocks after they’ve been fighting.
Name: Fraxure

Pokedex Entry: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.
Name: Axew

Pokedex Entry: It absorbs a spirit, which it then burns. By waving the flames on its arms, it puts its foes into a hypnotic trance.
Name: Chandelure

Pokedex Entry: This ominous Pokémon is feared. Through cities it wanders, searching for the spirits of the fallen.
Name: Lampent

Pokedex Entry: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.
Name: Litwick

Pokedex Entry: It can manipulate an opponent’s memory. Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three different-colored fingers.
Name: Beheeyem

Pokedex Entry: It uses its strong psychic power to squeeze its opponent’s brain, causing unendurable headaches.
Name: Elgyem

Pokedex Entry: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.
Name: Eelektross

Pokedex Entry: They coil around foes and shock them with electricity-generating organs that seem simply to be circular patterns.
Name: Eelektrik

Pokedex Entry: While one alone doesn’t have much power, a chain of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.
Name: Tynamo

Pokedex Entry: Its red core functions as an energy tank. It fires the charged energy through its spikes into an area.
Name: Klinklang

Pokedex Entry: By changing the direction in which it rotates, it communicates its feelings to others. When angry, it rotates faster.
Name: Klang

Pokedex Entry: The two minigears that mesh together are predetermined. Each will rebound from other minigears without meshing.
Name: Klink

Pokedex Entry: It fights by swinging around its three spiky feelers. A hit from these steel spikes can reduce a boulder to rubble.
Name: Ferrothorn

Pokedex Entry: When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage of spikes, which gives it a chance to escape by rolling away.
Name: Ferroseed

Pokedex Entry: When attacked, they create an electric barrier by spitting out many electrically charged threads.
Name: Galvantula

Pokedex Entry: Joltik that live in cities have learned a technique for sucking electricity from the outlets in houses.
Name: Joltik

Pokedex Entry: The special membrane enveloping Alomomola has the ability to heal wounds.
Name: Alomomola

Pokedex Entry: The fate of the ships and crew that wander into Jellicent’s habitat: all sunken, all lost, all vanished.
Name: Jellicent

Pokedex Entry: With its thin, veil-like arms wrapped around the body of its opponent, it sinks to the ocean floor.
Name: Frillish

Pokedex Entry: It lures prey close by dancing and waving its arm caps, which resemble Poké Balls, in a swaying motion.
Name: Amoonguss

Pokedex Entry: It lures people in with its Poké Ball pattern, then releases poison spores. Why it resembles a Poké Ball is unknown.
Name: Foongus

Pokedex Entry: They fly around at high speed, striking with their pointed spears. Even when in trouble, they face opponents bravely.
Name: Escavalier

Pokedex Entry: These mysterious Pokémon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as Shelmet.
Name: Karrablast

Pokedex Entry: The energy made in its cheeks’ electric pouches is stored inside its membrane and released while it is gliding.
Name: Emolga

Pokedex Entry: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck’s horns.
Name: Sawsbuck

Pokedex Entry: The color and scent of their fur changes to match the mountain grass. When they sense hostility, they hide in the grass.
Name: Deerling

Pokedex Entry: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and attack their foes with violent blizzards.
Name: Vanilluxe

Pokedex Entry: Snowy mountains are this Pokémon’s habitat. During an ancient ice age, they moved to southern areas.
Name: Vanillish

Pokedex Entry: The temperature of their breath is -58° F. They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them.
Name: Vanillite

Pokedex Entry: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.
Name: Swanna

Pokedex Entry: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.
Name: Reuniclus

Pokedex Entry: These bird Pokémon are excellent divers. They swim around in the water eating their favorite food--peat moss.
Name: Ducklett

Pokedex Entry: Since they have two divided brains, at times they suddenly try to take two different actions at once.
Name: Duosion

Pokedex Entry: They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.
Name: Solosis

Pokedex Entry: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.
Name: Gothitelle

Pokedex Entry: They use hypnosis to control people and Pokémon. Tales of Gothorita leading people astray are told in every corner.
Name: Gothorita

Pokedex Entry: Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic power. They are always staring at something.
Name: Gothita

Pokedex Entry: Their white fur is coated in a special oil that makes it easy for them to deflect attacks.
Name: Cinccino

Pokedex Entry: They greet one another by rubbing each other with their tails, which are always kept well groomed and clean.
Name: Minccino

Pokedex Entry: Bonds between these Pokémon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.
Name: Zoroark

Pokedex Entry: It changes into the forms of others to surprise them. Apparently, it often transforms into a silent child.
Name: Zorua

Pokedex Entry: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.
Name: Garbodor

Pokedex Entry: Inhaling the gas they belch will make you sleep for a week. They prefer unsanitary places.
Name: Trubbish

Pokedex Entry: They are intelligent and will cooperate to catch prey. From the ground, they use a running start to take flight.
Name: Archeops

Pokedex Entry: Said to be an ancestor of bird Pokémon, they were unable to fly and moved about by hopping from one branch to another.
Name: Archen

Pokedex Entry: They can live both in the ocean and on land. A slap from one of them is enough to open a hole in the bottom of a tanker.
Name: Carracosta

Pokedex Entry: Restored from a fossil, this Pokémon can dive to depths beyond half a mile.
Name: Tirtouga

Pokedex Entry: It has been said that they swallow those who get too close and turn them into mummies. They like to eat gold nuggets.
Name: Cofagrigus

Pokedex Entry: Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face when it was human. Sometimes they look at it and cry.
Name: Yamask

Pokedex Entry: They never vary the route they fly, because their memories of guarding an ancient city remain steadfast.
Name: Sigilyph

Pokedex Entry: Groups of them beat up anything that enters their territory. Each can spit acidic liquid from its mouth.
Name: Scrafty

Pokedex Entry: Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce damage by defensively pulling its skin up to its neck.
Name: Scraggy

Pokedex Entry: Competing for territory, Crustle fight viciously. The one whose boulder is broken is the loser of the battle.
Name: Crustle

Pokedex Entry: This Pokémon can easily melt holes in hard rocks with a liquid secreted from its mouth.
Name: Dwebble

Pokedex Entry: It uses an up-tempo song and dance to drive away the bird Pokémon that prey on its flower seeds.
Name: Maractus

Pokedex Entry: Its internal fire burns at 2,500° F, making enough power that it can destroy a dump truck with one punch.
Name: Darmanitan

Pokedex Entry: When its internal fire is burning, it cannot calm down and it runs around. When the fire diminishes, it falls asleep.
Name: Darumaka

Pokedex Entry: They never allow prey to escape. Their jaws are so powerful, they can crush the body of an automobile.
Name: Krookodile

Pokedex Entry: They live in groups of a few individuals. Protective membranes shield their eyes from sandstorms.
Name: Krokorok

Pokedex Entry: They live buried in the sands of the desert. The sun-warmed sands prevent their body temperature from dropping.
Name: Sandile

Pokedex Entry: Red and blue Basculin get along so poorly, they’ll start fighting instantly. These Pokémon are very hostile.
Name: Basculin

Pokedex Entry: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. This Pokémon is popular with celebrities.
Name: Lilligant

Pokedex Entry: The leaves on its head are very bitter. Eating one of these leaves is known to refresh a tired body.
Name: Petilil

Pokedex Entry: Like the wind, it can slip through any gap, no matter how small. It leaves balls of white fluff behind.
Name: Whimsicott

Pokedex Entry: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.
Name: Scolipede

Pokedex Entry: When attacked, it escapes by shooting cotton from its body. The cotton serves as a decoy to distract the attacker.
Name: Cottonee

Pokedex Entry: Protected by a hard shell, it spins its body like a wheel and crashes furiously into its enemies.
Name: Whirlipede

Pokedex Entry: Its bite injects a potent poison, enough to paralyze large bird Pokémon that try to prey on it.
Name: Venipede

Pokedex Entry: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves, using the cutters on its arms and sticky silk.
Name: Leavanny

Pokedex Entry: Forests where Swadloon live have superb foliage because the nutrients they make from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.
Name: Swadloon

Pokedex Entry: Leavanny dress it in clothes they made for it when it hatched. It hides its head in its hood while it is sleeping.
Name: Sewaddle

Pokedex Entry: The sound of Sawk punching boulders and trees can be heard all the way from the mountains where they train.
Name: Sawk

Pokedex Entry: When it tightens its belt, it becomes stronger. Wild Throh use vines to weave their own belts.
Name: Throh

Pokedex Entry: They shoot paralyzing liquid from their head bumps. They use vibration to hurt their opponents.
Name: Seismitoad

Pokedex Entry: When they vibrate the bumps on their heads, they can make waves in water or earthquake-like vibrations on land.
Name: Palpitoad

Pokedex Entry: They warn others of danger by vibrating their cheeks to create a high-pitched sound.
Name: Tympole

Pokedex Entry: It is thought that Conkeldurr taught humans how to make concrete more than 2,000 years ago.
Name: Conkeldurr

Pokedex Entry: This Pokémon is so muscular and strongly built that even a group of wrestlers could not make it budge an inch.
Name: Gurdurr

Pokedex Entry: It fights by swinging a piece of lumber around. It is close to evolving when it can handle the lumber without difficulty.
Name: Timburr

Pokedex Entry: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.
Name: Audino

Pokedex Entry: It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has evolved into steel strong enough to bore through iron plates.
Name: Excadrill

Pokedex Entry: It can dig through the ground at a speed of 30 mph. It could give a car running aboveground a good race.
Name: Drilbur

Pokedex Entry: It emits sound waves of various frequencies from its nose, including some powerful enough to destroy rocks.
Name: Swoobat

Pokedex Entry: Its habitat is dark forests and caves. It emits ultrasonic waves from its nose to learn about its surroundings.
Name: Woobat

Pokedex Entry: Compressing the energy from its internal core lets it fire off an attack capable of blowing away a mountain.
Name: Gigalith

Pokedex Entry: When it overflows with power, the orange crystal on its body glows. It looks for underground water in caves.
Name: Boldore

Pokedex Entry: Its ear is hexagonal in shape. Compressed underground, its body is as hard as steel.
Name: Roggenrola

Pokedex Entry: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates.
Name: Zebstrika

Pokedex Entry: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use their flashing manes to communicate with one another.
Name: Blitzle

Pokedex Entry: Males swing their head plumage to threaten opponents. The females’ flying abilities surpass those of the males.
Name: Unfezant

Pokedex Entry: It can return to its Trainer’s location regardless of the distance separating them.
Name: Tranquill

Pokedex Entry: Each follows its Trainer’s orders as best it can, but they sometimes fail to understand complicated commands.
Name: Pidove

Pokedex Entry: The mist emanating from their foreheads is packed with the dreams of people and Pokémon.
Name: Musharna

Pokedex Entry: Munna always float in the air. People whose dreams are eaten by them forget what the dreams had been about.
Name: Munna

Pokedex Entry: The tuft on its head holds water. When the level runs low, it replenishes the tuft by siphoning up water with its tail.
Name: Simipour

Pokedex Entry: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.
Name: Panpour

Pokedex Entry: It loves sweets because they become energy for the fire burning inside its body.
Name: Simisear

Pokedex Entry: Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its barbed tail around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is very bitter.
Name: Simisage

Pokedex Entry: When it is angered, the temperature of its head tuft reaches 600° F. It uses its tuft to roast berries.
Name: Pansear

Pokedex Entry: This Pokémon dwells deep in the forest. Eating a leaf from its head whisks weariness away as if by magic.
Name: Pansage

Pokedex Entry: These Pokémon vanish and appear unexpectedly. Many Trainers are drawn to their beautiful form and fur.
Name: Liepard

Pokedex Entry: They steal from people for fun, but their victims can’t help but forgive them. Their deceptively cute act is perfect.
Name: Purrloin

Pokedex Entry: It rescues people stranded by blizzards in the mountains. Its shaggy fur shields it from the cold.
Name: Stoutland

Pokedex Entry: It has black, cape-like fur that is very hard and decreases the amount of damage it receives.
Name: Herdier

Pokedex Entry: It faces strong opponents with great courage. But, when at a disadvantage in a fight, this intelligent Pokémon flees.
Name: Lillipup

Pokedex Entry: When they see an enemy, their tails stand high, and they spit the seeds of berries stored in their cheek pouches.
Name: Watchog

Pokedex Entry: Using food stored in cheek pouches, they can keep watch for days. They use their tails to communicate with others.
Name: Patrat

Pokedex Entry: One swing of the sword incorporated in its armor can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of them quiets everybody.
Name: Samurott

Pokedex Entry: Strict training is how it learns its flowing double-scalchop technique.
Name: Dewott

Pokedex Entry: It fights using the scalchop on its stomach. In response to an attack, it retaliates immediately by slashing.
Name: Oshawott

Pokedex Entry: When its internal fire flares up, its movements grow sharper and faster. When in trouble, it emits smoke.
Name: Pignite

Pokedex Entry: It can throw a fire punch by setting its fists on fire with its fiery chin. It cares deeply about its friends.
Name: Emboar

Pokedex Entry: It can deftly dodge its foe’s attacks while shooting fireballs from its nose. It roasts berries before it eats them.
Name: Tepig

Pokedex Entry: It can stop its opponents’ movements with just a glare. It takes in solar energy and boosts it internally.
Name: Serperior

Pokedex Entry: It moves along the ground as if sliding. Its swift movements befuddle its foes, and it then attacks with a vine whip.
Name: Servine

Pokedex Entry: It is very intelligent and calm. Being exposed to lots of sunlight makes its movements swifter.
Name: Snivy

Pokedex Entry: This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.
Name: Victini

Pokedex Entry: It is described in mythology as the Pokémon that shaped the universe with its 1,000 arms.
Name: Arceus

Pokedex Entry: It lives in flower patches and avoids detection by curling up to look like a flowering plant.
Name: Shaymin

Pokedex Entry: It can lull people to sleep and make them dream. It is active during nights of the new moon.
Name: Darkrai

Pokedex Entry: Born on a cold seafloor, it will swim great distances to return to its birthplace.
Name: Manaphy

Pokedex Entry: A Pokémon that lives in warm seas. It inflates the flotation sac on its head to drift and search for food.
Name: Phione

Pokedex Entry: Shiny particles are released from its wings like a veil. It is said to represent the crescent moon.
Name: Cresselia

Pokedex Entry: A Pokémon that is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours. It appears in an ancient cemetery.
Name: Giratina

Pokedex Entry: There is an enduring legend that states this Pokémon towed continents with ropes.
Name: Regigigas

Pokedex Entry: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.
Name: Heatran

Pokedex Entry: It has the ability to distort space. It is described as a deity in Sinnoh-region mythology.
Name: Palkia

Pokedex Entry: It has the power to control time. It appears in Sinnoh-region myths as an ancient deity.
Name: Dialga

Pokedex Entry: Known as “The Being of Willpower.” It sleeps at the bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.
Name: Azelf

Pokedex Entry: Known as “The Being of Emotion.” It taught humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.
Name: Mesprit

Pokedex Entry: Known as “The Being of Knowledge.” It is said that it can wipe out the memory of those who see its eyes.
Name: Uxie

Pokedex Entry: Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.
Name: Rotom

Pokedex Entry: It freezes foes with an icy breath nearly -60 degrees F. What seems to be its body is actually hollow.
Name: Froslass

Pokedex Entry: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.
Name: Dusknoir

Pokedex Entry: It exudes strong magnetism from all over. It controls three small units called Mini-Noses.
Name: Probopass

Pokedex Entry: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.
Name: Gallade

Pokedex Entry: Additional software was installed to make it a better Pokémon. It began acting oddly, however.
Name: Porygon-Z

Pokedex Entry: Its impressive tusks are made of ice. The population thinned when it turned warm after the ice age.
Name: Mamoswine

Pokedex Entry: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!
Name: Gliscor

Pokedex Entry: As a protective technique, it can completely freeze its fur to make its hairs stand like needles.
Name: Glaceon

Pokedex Entry: Just like a plant, it uses photosynthesis. As a result, it is always enveloped in clear air.
Name: Leafeon

Pokedex Entry: By churning its wings, it creates shock waves that inflict critical internal injuries to foes.
Name: Yanmega

Pokedex Entry: It will never appear where there is strife. Its sightings have become rare recently.
Name: Togekiss

Pokedex Entry: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees F from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.
Name: Magmortar

Pokedex Entry: It pushes the tips of its two tails against the foe, then lets loose with over 20,000 volts of power.
Name: Electivire

Pokedex Entry: It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines. Losing arms to predators does not trouble it.
Name: Tangrowth

Pokedex Entry: It puts rocks in holes in its palms and uses its muscles to shoot them. GEODUDE are shot at rare times.
Name: Rhyperior

Pokedex Entry: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.
Name: Lickilicky

Pokedex Entry: It evolved from exposure to a special magnetic field. Three units generate magnetism.
Name: Magnezone

Pokedex Entry: They live in cold regions, forming groups of four or five that hunt prey with impressive coordination.
Name: Weavile

Pokedex Entry: It whips up blizzards in mountains that are always buried in snow. It is the abominable snowman.
Name: Abomasnow

Pokedex Entry: It lives on snowy mountains. Having had little contact with humans, it is boldly inquisitive.
Name: Snover

Pokedex Entry: A friendly Pokémon that captures the subtle flows of seawater using its two antennae.
Name: Mantyke

Pokedex Entry: After long exposure to sunlight, the patterns on its tail fins shine vividly when darkness arrives.
Name: Finneon

Pokedex Entry: It lives on the deep-sea floor. It attracts prey by flashing the patterns on its four tail fins.
Name: Lumineon

Pokedex Entry: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.
Name: Carnivine

Pokedex Entry: Its knuckle claws secrete a toxin so vile that even a scratch could prove fatal.
Name: Toxicroak

Pokedex Entry: Its cheeks hold poison sacs. It tries to catch foes off guard to jab them with toxic fingers.
Name: Croagunk

Pokedex Entry: It has the power in its clawed arms to make scrap of a car. The tips of its claws release poison.
Name: Drapion

Pokedex Entry: It grips prey with its tail claws and injects poison. It tenaciously hangs on until the poison takes.
Name: Skorupi

Pokedex Entry: It blasts internally stored sand from ports on its body to create a towering twister for attack.
Name: Hippowdon

Pokedex Entry: It lives in arid places. Instead of perspiration, it expels grainy sand from its body.
Name: Hippopotas

Pokedex Entry: It has the ability to sense the auras of all things. It understands human speech.
Name: Lucario

Pokedex Entry: The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.
Name: Riolu

Pokedex Entry: It wolfs down its weight in food once a day, swallowing food whole with almost no chewing.
Name: Munchlax

Pokedex Entry: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.
Name: Garchomp

Pokedex Entry: There is a long-held belief that medicine made from its scales will heal even incurable illnesses.
Name: Gabite

Pokedex Entry: It nests in small, horizontal holes in cave walls. It pounces to catch prey that stray too close.
Name: Gible

Pokedex Entry: A Pokémon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone.
Name: Spiritomb

Pokedex Entry: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.
Name: Chatot

Pokedex Entry: It loves round white things. It carries an egg-shaped rock in imitation of CHANSEY.
Name: Happiny

Pokedex Entry: It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this Pokémon.
Name: Mime Jr.

Pokedex Entry: It looks as if it is always crying. It is actually adjusting its body’s fluid levels by eliminating excess.
Name: Bonsly

Pokedex Entry: One caused a news sensation when it was dug up at a construction site after a 2,000-year sleep.
Name: Bronzong

Pokedex Entry: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. It is unknown if they are related.
Name: Bronzor

Pokedex Entry: It sprays a vile-smelling fluid from the tip of its tail to attack. Its range is over 160 feet.
Name: Skuntank

Pokedex Entry: It protects itself by spraying a noxious fluid from its rear. The stench lingers for 24 hours.
Name: Stunky

Pokedex Entry: It emits cries by agitating an orb at the back of its throat. It moves with flouncing hops.
Name: Chingling

Pokedex Entry: It is a brazen brute that barges its way into another Pokémon’s nest and claims it as its own.
Name: Purugly

Pokedex Entry: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.
Name: Glameow

Pokedex Entry: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous MURKROW in tow.
Name: Honchkrow

Pokedex Entry: Its cries sound like incantations. Those hearing it are tormented by headaches and hallucinations.
Name: Mismagius

Pokedex Entry: An extremely cautious Pokémon. It cloaks its body with its fluffy ear fur when it senses danger.
Name: Lopunny

Pokedex Entry: It slams foes by sharply uncoiling its rolled ears. It stings enough to make a grown-up cry in pain.
Name: Buneary

Pokedex Entry: A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.
Name: Drifloon

Pokedex Entry: It’s drowzy in daytime, but flies off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.
Name: Drifblim

Pokedex Entry: To eat, it deftly shucks nuts with its two tails. It rarely uses its arms now.
Name: Ambipom

Pokedex Entry: It has a pliable body without any bones. If any part of its body is torn off, it grows right back.
Name: Gastrodon

Pokedex Entry: Its colors and shapes differ from region to region. In the Sinnoh region, two types are confirmed.
Name: Shellos

Pokedex Entry: It blooms during times of strong sunlight. It tries to make up for everything it endured as a bud.
Name: Cherrim

Pokedex Entry: The small ball holds the nutrients needed for evolution. Apparently, it is very sweet and tasty.
Name: Cherubi

Pokedex Entry: It floats using its well-developed flotation sac. It assists in the rescues of drowning people.
Name: Floatzel

Pokedex Entry: It has a flotation sac that is like an inflatable collar. It floats on water with its head out.
Name: Buizel

Pokedex Entry: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.
Name: Pachirisu

Pokedex Entry: Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs. It raises its grubs on honey collected by COMBEE.
Name: Vespiquen

Pokedex Entry: A Pokémon formed by three others. It busily carries sweet floral honey to VESPIQUEN.
Name: Combee

Pokedex Entry: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by COMBEE.
Name: Mothim

Pokedex Entry: When BURMY evolved, its cloak became a part of this Pokémon’s body. The cloak is never shed.
Name: Wormadam

Pokedex Entry: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.
Name: Burmy

Pokedex Entry: Any frontal attack is repulsed. It is a docile Pokémon that feeds on grass and berries.
Name: Bastiodon

Pokedex Entry: A Pokémon that lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its facial hide is extremely hard.
Name: Shieldon

Pokedex Entry: Its powerful head butt has enough power to shatter even the most durable things upon impact.
Name: Rampardos

Pokedex Entry: It lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its skull is as hard as iron.
Name: Cranidos

Pokedex Entry: It attracts prey with a sweet aroma, then downs it with thorny whips hidden in its arms.
Name: Roserade

Pokedex Entry: Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.
Name: Budew

Pokedex Entry: It has eyes that can see through anything. It spots and captures prey hiding behind objects.
Name: Luxray

Pokedex Entry: Its claws loose electricity with enough amperage to cause fainting. They live in small groups.
Name: Luxio

Pokedex Entry: All of its fur dazzles if danger is sensed. It flees while the foe is momentarily blinded.
Name: Shinx

Pokedex Entry: It crosses its knifelike arms in front of its chest when it cries. It can compose melodies ad lib.
Name: Kricketune

Pokedex Entry: It shakes its head back to front, causing its antennae to hit each other and sound like a xylophone.
Name: Kricketot

Pokedex Entry: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.
Name: Bibarel

Pokedex Entry: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.
Name: Bidoof

Pokedex Entry: It has a savage nature. It will courageously challenge foes that are much larger.
Name: Staraptor

Pokedex Entry: It flies around forests and fields in search of bug Pokémon. It stays within a huge flock.
Name: Staravia

Pokedex Entry: They flock in great numbers. Though small, they flap their wings with great power.
Name: Starly

Pokedex Entry: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns.
Name: Empoleon

Pokedex Entry: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.
Name: Prinplup

Pokedex Entry: Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.
Name: Piplup

Pokedex Entry: It uses a special kind of martial arts involving all its limbs. Its fire never goes out.
Name: Infernape

Pokedex Entry: To intimidate attackers, it stretches the fire on its tail to make itself appear bigger.
Name: Monferno

Pokedex Entry: It agilely scales sheer cliffs to live atop craggy mountains. Its fire is put out when it sleeps.
Name: Chimchar

Pokedex Entry: Small Pokémon occasionally gather on its unmoving back to begin building their nests.
Name: Torterra

Pokedex Entry: Made from soil, the shell on its back hardens when it drinks water. It lives along lakes.
Name: Turtwig

Pokedex Entry: The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in DEOXYS. The crystalline organ on this POKéMON’s chest appears to be its brain.
Name: Deoxys

Pokedex Entry: A legend states that JIRACHI will make true any wish that is written on notes attached to its head when it awakens. If this POKéMON senses danger, it will fight without awakening.
Name: Jirachi

Pokedex Entry: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.
Name: Grotle

Pokedex Entry: RAYQUAZA lived for hundreds of millions of years in the earth’s ozone layer, never descending to the ground. This POKéMON appears to feed on water and particles in the atmosphere.
Name: Rayquaza

Pokedex Entry: GROUDON has long been described in mythology as the POKéMON that raised lands and expanded continents. This POKéMON took to sleep after a cataclysmic battle with KYOGRE.
Name: Groudon

Pokedex Entry: KYOGRE has the power to create massive rain clouds that cover the entire sky and bring about torrential downpours. This POKéMON saved people who were suffering from droughts.
Name: Kyogre

Pokedex Entry: LATIOS has the ability to make its foe see an image of what it has seen or imagines in its head. This POKéMON is intelligent and understands human speech.
Name: Latios

Pokedex Entry: LATIAS is highly sensitive to the emotions of people. If it senses any hostility, this POKéMON ruffles the feathers all over its body and cries shrilly to intimidate the foe.
Name: Latias

Pokedex Entry: REGISTEEL has a body that is harder than any kind of metal. Its body is apparently hollow. No one has any idea what this POKéMON eats.
Name: Registeel

Pokedex Entry: REGICE’s body was made during an ice age. The deep-frozen body can’t be melted, even by fire. This POKéMON controls frigid air of minus 328 degrees F.
Name: Regice

Pokedex Entry: REGIROCK was sealed away by people long ago. If this POKéMON’s body is damaged in battle, it is said to seek out suitable rocks on its own to repair itself.
Name: Regirock

Pokedex Entry: METAGROSS has four brains in total. Combined, the four brains can breeze through difficult calculations faster than a supercomputer. This POKéMON can float in the air by tucking in its four legs.
Name: Metagross

Pokedex Entry: When two BELDUM fuse together, METANG is formed. The brains of the BELDUM are joined by a magnetic nervous system. By linking its brains magnetically, this POKéMON generates strong psychokinetic power.
Name: Metang

Pokedex Entry: Instead of blood, a powerful magnetic force courses throughout BELDUM’s body. This POKéMON communicates with others by sending controlled pulses of magnetism.
Name: Beldum

Pokedex Entry: SALAMENCE came about as a result of a strong, long-held dream of growing wings. It is said that this powerful desire triggered a sudden mutation in this POKéMON’s cells, causing it to sprout its magnificent wings.
Name: Salamence

Pokedex Entry: Inside SHELGON’s armor-like shell, cells are in the midst of transformation to create an entirely new body. This POKéMON’s shell is extremely heavy, making its movements sluggish.
Name: Shelgon

Pokedex Entry: BAGON has a dream of one day soaring in the sky. In doomed efforts to fly, this POKéMON hurls itself off cliffs. As a result of its dives, its head has grown tough and as hard as tempered steel.
Name: Bagon

Pokedex Entry: LUVDISC live in shallow seas in the tropics. This heart-shaped POKéMON earned its name by swimming after loving couples it spotted in the ocean’s waves.
Name: Luvdisc

Pokedex Entry: RELICANTH is a POKéMON species that existed for a hundred million years without ever changing its form. This ancient POKéMON feeds on microscopic organisms with its toothless mouth.
Name: Relicanth

Pokedex Entry: GOREBYSS lives in the southern seas at extreme depths. Its body is built to withstand the enormous pressure of water at incredible depths. Because of this, this POKéMON’s body is unharmed by ordinary attacks.
Name: Gorebyss

Pokedex Entry: HUNTAIL’s presence went unnoticed by people for a long time because it lives at extreme depths in the sea. This POKéMON’s eyes can see clearly even in the murky dark depths of the ocean.
Name: Huntail

Pokedex Entry: CLAMPERL’s sturdy shell is not only good for protection - it is also used for clamping and catching prey. A fully grown CLAMPERL’s shell will be scored with nicks and scratches all over.
Name: Clamperl

Pokedex Entry: WALREIN’s two massively developed tusks can totally shatter blocks of ice weighing ten tons with one blow. This POKéMON’s thick coat of blubber insulates it from subzero temperatures.
Name: Walrein

Pokedex Entry: SEALEO has the habit of always juggling on the tip of its nose anything it sees for the first time. This POKéMON occasionally entertains itself by balancing and rolling a SPHEAL on its nose.
Name: Sealeo

Pokedex Entry: SPHEAL is much faster rolling than walking to get around. When groups of this POKéMON eat, they all clap at once to show their pleasure. Because of this, their mealtimes are noisy.
Name: Spheal

Pokedex Entry: GLALIE has a body made of rock, which it hardens with an armor of ice. This POKéMON has the ability to freeze moisture in the atmosphere into any shape it desires.
Name: Glalie

Pokedex Entry: SNORUNT live in regions with heavy snowfall. In seasons without snow, such as spring and summer, this POKéMON steals away to live quietly among stalactites and stalagmites deep in caverns.
Name: Snorunt

Pokedex Entry: WYNAUT can always be seen with a big, happy smile on its face. Look at its tail to determine if it is angry. When angered, this POKéMON will be slapping the ground with its tail.
Name: Wynaut

Pokedex Entry: Every time ABSOL appears before people, it is followed by a disaster such as an earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the disaster POKéMON.
Name: Absol

Pokedex Entry: CHIMECHO makes its cries echo inside its hollow body. When this POKéMON becomes enraged, its cries result in ultrasonic waves that have the power to knock foes flying.
Name: Chimecho

Pokedex Entry: The bunches of fruit around TROPIUS’s neck are very popular with children. This POKéMON loves fruit, and eats it continuously. Apparently, its love for fruit resulted in its own outgrowth of fruit.
Name: Tropius

Pokedex Entry: DUSCLOPS’s body is completely hollow - there is nothing at all inside. It is said that its body is like a black hole. This POKéMON will absorb anything into its body, but nothing will ever come back out.
Name: Dusclops

Pokedex Entry: DUSKULL can pass through any wall no matter how thick it may be. Once this POKéMON chooses a target, it will doggedly pursue the intended victim until the break of dawn.
Name: Duskull

Pokedex Entry: BANETTE generates energy for laying strong curses by sticking pins into its own body. This POKéMON was originally a pitiful plush doll that was thrown away.
Name: Banette

Pokedex Entry: SHUPPET is attracted by feelings of jealousy and vindictiveness. If someone develops strong feelings of vengeance, this POKéMON will appear in a swarm and line up beneath the eaves of that person’s home.
Name: Shuppet

Pokedex Entry: KECLEON is capable of changing its body colors at will to blend in with its surroundings. There is one exception - this POKéMON can’t change the zigzag pattern on its belly.
Name: Kecleon

Pokedex Entry: CASTFORM’s appearance changes with the weather. This POKéMON gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect its tiny body.
Name: Castform

Pokedex Entry: MILOTIC is said to be the most beautiful of all the POKéMON. It has the power to becalm such emotions as anger and hostility to quell bitter feuding.
Name: Milotic

Pokedex Entry: FEEBAS’s fins are ragged and tattered from the start of its life. Because of its shoddy appearance, this POKéMON is largely ignored. It is capable of living in both the sea and in rivers.
Name: Feebas

Pokedex Entry: ARMALDO’s tough armor makes all attacks bounce off. This POKéMON’s two enormous claws can be freely extended or contracted. They have the power to punch right through a steel slab.
Name: Armaldo

Pokedex Entry: ANORITH was regenerated from a prehistoric fossil. This primitive POKéMON once lived in warm seas. It grips its prey firmly between its two large claws.
Name: Anorith

Pokedex Entry: CRADILY roams around the ocean floor in search of food. This POKéMON freely extends its tree trunk-like neck and captures unwary prey using its eight tentacles.
Name: Cradily

Pokedex Entry: LILEEP became extinct approximately a hundred million years ago. This ancient POKéMON attaches itself to a rock on the seafloor and catches approaching prey using tentacles shaped like flower petals.
Name: Lileep

Pokedex Entry: CLAYDOL are said to be dolls of mud made by primitive humans and brought to life by exposure to a mysterious ray. This POKéMON moves about while levitating.
Name: Claydol

Pokedex Entry: BALTOY moves while spinning around on its one foot. Primitive wall paintings depicting this POKéMON living among people were discovered in some ancient ruins.
Name: Baltoy

Pokedex Entry: CRAWDAUNT has an extremely violent nature that compels it to challenge other living things to battle. Other life-forms refuse to live in ponds inhabited by this POKéMON, making them desolate places.
Name: Crawdaunt

Pokedex Entry: CORPHISH were originally foreign POKéMON that were imported as pets. They eventually turned up in the wild. This POKéMON is very hardy and has greatly increased its population.
Name: Corphish

Pokedex Entry: WHISCASH is extremely territorial. Just one of these POKéMON will claim a large pond as its exclusive territory. If a foe approaches it, it thrashes about and triggers a massive earthquake.
Name: Whiscash

Pokedex Entry: BARBOACH’s sensitive whiskers serve as a superb radar system. This POKéMON hides in mud, leaving only its two whiskers exposed while it waits for prey to come along.
Name: Barboach

Pokedex Entry: SOLROCK is a new species of POKéMON that is said to have fallen from space. It floats in air and moves silently. In battle, this POKéMON releases intensely bright light.
Name: Solrock

Pokedex Entry: LUNATONE was discovered at a location where a meteorite fell. As a result, some people theorize that this POKéMON came from space. However, no one has been able to prove this theory so far.
Name: Lunatone

Pokedex Entry: SEVIPER shares a generations-long feud with ZANGOOSE. The scars on its body are evidence of vicious battles. This POKéMON attacks using its sword-edged tail.
Name: Seviper

Pokedex Entry: Memories of battling its arch-rival SEVIPER are etched into every cell of ZANGOOSE’s body. This POKéMON adroitly dodges attacks with incredible agility.
Name: Zangoose

Pokedex Entry: ALTARIA dances and wheels through the sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds. By singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this POKéMON makes its listeners experience dreamy wonderment.
Name: Altaria

Pokedex Entry: SWABLU has light and fluffy wings that are like cottony clouds. This POKéMON is not frightened of people. It lands on the heads of people and sits there like a cotton-fluff hat.
Name: Swablu

Pokedex Entry: During the daytime, CACTURNE remains unmoving so that it does not lose any moisture to the harsh desert sun. This POKéMON becomes active at night when the temperature drops.
Name: Cacturne

Pokedex Entry: CACNEA lives in arid locations such as deserts. It releases a strong aroma from its flower to attract prey. When prey comes near, this POKéMON shoots sharp thorns from its body to bring the victim down.
Name: Cacnea

Pokedex Entry: FLYGON is nicknamed “the elemental spirit of the desert.” Because its flapping wings whip up a cloud of sand, this POKéMON is always enveloped in a sandstorm while flying.
Name: Flygon

Pokedex Entry: To make prey faint, VIBRAVA generates ultrasonic waves by vigorously making its two wings vibrate. This POKéMON’s ultrasonic waves are so powerful, they can bring on headaches in people.
Name: Vibrava

Pokedex Entry: TRAPINCH’s nest is a sloped, bowl-like pit dug in sand. This POKéMON patiently waits for prey to tumble down the pit. Its giant jaws have enough strength to crush even boulders.
Name: Trapinch

Pokedex Entry: All the SPINDA that exist in the world are said to have utterly unique spot patterns. The shaky, tottering steps of this POKéMON give it the appearance of dancing.
Name: Spinda

Pokedex Entry: GRUMPIG uses the black pearls on its body to amplify its psychic power waves for gaining total control over its foe. When this POKéMON uses its special power, its snorting breath grows labored.
Name: Grumpig

Pokedex Entry: SPOINK bounces around on its tail. The shock of its bouncing makes its heart pump. As a result, this POKéMON cannot afford to stop bouncing - if it stops, its heart will stop.
Name: Spoink

Pokedex Entry: TORKOAL digs through mountains in search of coal. If it finds some, it fills hollow spaces on its shell with the coal and burns it. If it is attacked, this POKéMON spouts thick black smoke to beat a retreat.
Name: Torkoal

Pokedex Entry: CAMERUPT has a volcano inside its body. Magma of 18,000 degrees F courses through its body. Occasionally, the humps on this POKéMON’s back erupt, spewing the superheated magma.
Name: Camerupt

Pokedex Entry: NUMEL is extremely dull witted - it doesn’t notice being hit. However, it can’t stand hunger for even a second. This POKéMON’s body is a seething cauldron of boiling magma.
Name: Numel

Pokedex Entry: WAILORD is the largest of all identified POKéMON up to now. This giant POKéMON swims languorously in the vast open sea, eating massive amounts of food at once with its enormous mouth.
Name: Wailord

Pokedex Entry: WAILMER’s nostrils are located above its eyes. This playful POKéMON loves to startle people by forcefully snorting out seawater it stores inside its body out of its nostrils.
Name: Wailmer

Pokedex Entry: Nicknamed “the bully of the sea,” SHARPEDO is widely feared. Its cruel fangs grow back immediately if they snap off. Just one of these POKéMON can thoroughly tear apart a supertanker.
Name: Sharpedo

Pokedex Entry: CARVANHA’s strongly developed jaws and its sharply pointed fangs pack the destructive power to rip out boat hulls. Many boats have been attacked and sunk by this POKéMON.
Name: Carvanha

Pokedex Entry: When SWALOT spots prey, it spurts out a hideously toxic fluid from its pores and sprays the target. Once the prey has weakened, this POKéMON gulps it down whole with its cavernous mouth.
Name: Swalot

Pokedex Entry: Virtually all of GULPIN’s body is its stomach. As a result, it can swallow something its own size. This POKéMON’s stomach contains a special fluid that digests anything.
Name: Gulpin

Pokedex Entry: ROSELIA shoots sharp thorns as projectiles at any opponent that tries to steal the flowers on its arms. The aroma of this POKéMON brings serenity to living things.
Name: Roselia

Pokedex Entry: ILLUMISE attracts a swarm of VOLBEAT using a sweet fragrance. Once the VOLBEAT have gathered, this POKéMON leads the lit-up swarm in drawing geometric designs on the canvas of the night sky.
Name: Illumise

Pokedex Entry: With the arrival of night, VOLBEAT emits light from its tail. It communicates with others by adjusting the intensity and flashing of its light. This POKéMON is attracted by the sweet aroma of ILLUMISE.
Name: Volbeat

Pokedex Entry: MINUN is more concerned about cheering on its partners than its own safety. It shorts out the electricity in its body to create brilliant showers of sparks to cheer on its teammates.
Name: Minun

Pokedex Entry: PLUSLE always acts as a cheerleader for its partners. Whenever a teammate puts out a good effort in battle, this POKéMON shorts out its body to create the crackling noises of sparks to show its joy.
Name: Plusle

Pokedex Entry: MANECTRIC is constantly discharging electricity from its mane. The sparks sometimes ignite forest fires. When it enters a battle, this POKéMON creates thunderclouds.
Name: Manectric

Pokedex Entry: ELECTRIKE stores electricity in its long body hair. This POKéMON stimulates its leg muscles with electric charges. These jolts of power give its legs explosive acceleration performance.
Name: Electrike

Pokedex Entry: It is said that through meditation, MEDICHAM heightens energy inside its body and sharpens its sixth sense. This POKéMON hides its presence by merging itself with fields and mountains.
Name: Medicham

Pokedex Entry: MEDITITE undertakes rigorous mental training deep in the mountains. However, whenever it meditates, this POKéMON always loses its concentration and focus. As a result, its training never ends.
Name: Meditite

Pokedex Entry: AGGRON claims an entire mountain as its own territory. It mercilessly beats up anything that violates its environment. This POKéMON vigilantly patrols its territory at all times.
Name: Aggron

Pokedex Entry: LAIRON tempers its steel body by drinking highly nutritious mineral springwater until it is bloated. This POKéMON makes its nest close to springs of delicious water.
Name: Lairon

Pokedex Entry: This POKéMON has a body of steel. To make its body, ARON feeds on iron ore that it digs from mountains. Occasionally, it causes major trouble by eating bridges and rails.
Name: Aron

Pokedex Entry: MAWILE’s huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed. Its docile-looking face serves to lull its foe into letting down its guard. When the foe least expects it, MAWILE chomps it with its gaping jaws.
Name: Mawile

Pokedex Entry: SABLEYE lead quiet lives deep inside caverns. They are feared, however, because these POKéMON are thought to steal the spirits of people when their eyes burn with a sinister glow in the darkness.
Name: Sableye

Pokedex Entry: DELCATTY prefers to live an unfettered existence in which it can do as it pleases at its own pace. Because this POKéMON eats and sleeps whenever it decides, its daily routines are completely random.
Name: Delcatty

Pokedex Entry: SKITTY has the habit of becoming fascinated by moving objects and chasing them around. This POKéMON is known to chase after its own tail and become dizzy.
Name: Skitty

Pokedex Entry: NOSEPASS’s magnetic nose is always pointed to the north. If two of these POKéMON meet, they cannot turn their faces to each other when they are close because their magnetic noses repel one another.
Name: Nosepass

Pokedex Entry: AZURILL spins its tail as if it were a lasso, then hurls it far. The momentum of the throw sends its body flying, too. Using this unique action, one of these POKéMON managed to hurl itself a record 33 feet.
Name: Azurill

Pokedex Entry: HARIYAMA practices its straight-arm slaps in any number of locations. One hit of this POKéMON’s powerful, openhanded, straight-arm punches could snap a telephone pole in two.
Name: Hariyama

Pokedex Entry: MAKUHITA is tenacious - it will keep getting up and attacking its foe however many times it is knocked down. Every time it gets back up, this POKéMON stores more energy in its body for evolving.
Name: Makuhita

Pokedex Entry: EXPLOUD triggers earthquakes with the tremors it creates by bellowing. If this POKéMON violently inhales from the ports on its body, it’s a sign that it is preparing to let loose a huge bellow.
Name: Exploud

Pokedex Entry: LOUDRED’s bellowing can completely decimate a wood-frame house. It uses its voice to punish its foes. This POKéMON’s round ears serve as loudspeakers.
Name: Loudred
