Pokedex Entry: Normally, WHISMUR’s voice is very quiet - it is barely audible even if one is paying close attention. However, if this POKéMON senses danger, it starts crying at an earsplitting volume.
Name: Whismur

Pokedex Entry: SHEDINJA’s hard body doesn’t move - not even a twitch. In fact, its body appears to be merely a hollow shell. It is believed that this POKéMON will steal the spirit of anyone peering into its hollow body from its back.
Name: Shedinja

Pokedex Entry: NINJASK moves around at such a high speed that it cannot be seen, even while its crying can be clearly heard. For that reason, this POKéMON was long believed to be invisible.
Name: Ninjask

Pokedex Entry: NINCADA lives underground for many years in complete darkness. This POKéMON absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees. It stays motionless as it waits for evolution.
Name: Nincada

Pokedex Entry: SLAKING spends all day lying down and lolling about. It eats grass growing within its reach. If it eats all the grass it can reach, this POKéMON reluctantly moves to another spot.
Name: Slaking

Pokedex Entry: SLAKOTH lolls around for over twenty hours every day. Because it moves so little, it does not need much food. This POKéMON’s sole daily meal consists of just three leaves.
Name: Slakoth

Pokedex Entry: VIGOROTH is always itching and agitated to go on a wild rampage. It simply can’t tolerate sitting still for even a minute. This POKéMON’s stress level rises if it can’t be moving constantly.
Name: Vigoroth

Pokedex Entry: BRELOOM closes in on its foe with light and sprightly footwork, then throws punches with its stretchy arms. This POKéMON’s fighting technique puts boxers to shame.
Name: Breloom

Pokedex Entry: SHROOMISH live in damp soil in the dark depths of forests. They are often found keeping still under fallen leaves. This POKéMON feeds on compost that is made up of fallen, rotted leaves.
Name: Shroomish

Pokedex Entry: MASQUERAIN intimidates enemies with the eyelike patterns on its antennas. This POKéMON flaps its four wings to freely fly in any direction - even sideways and backwards - as if it were a helicopter.
Name: Masquerain

Pokedex Entry: From the tips of its feet, SURSKIT secretes an oil that enables it to walk on water as if it were skating. This POKéMON feeds on microscopic organisms in ponds and lakes.
Name: Surskit

Pokedex Entry: GARDEVOIR has the ability to read the future. If it senses impending danger to its TRAINER, this POKéMON is said to unleash its psychokinetic energy at full power.
Name: Gardevoir

Pokedex Entry: It is said that a KIRLIA that is exposed to the positive emotions of its TRAINER grows beautiful. This POKéMON controls psychokinetic powers with its highly developed brain.
Name: Kirlia

Pokedex Entry: RALTS senses the emotions of people using the horns on its head. This POKéMON rarely appears before people. But when it does, it draws closer if it senses that the person has a positive disposition.
Name: Ralts

Pokedex Entry: PELIPPER is a flying transporter that carries small POKéMON and eggs inside its massive bill. This POKéMON builds its nest on steep cliffs facing the sea.
Name: Pelipper

Pokedex Entry: WINGULL has the habit of carrying prey and valuables in its beak and hiding them in all sorts of locations. This POKéMON rides the winds and flies as if it were skating across the sky.
Name: Wingull

Pokedex Entry: SWELLOW flies high above our heads, making graceful arcs in the sky. This POKéMON dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. The hapless prey is tightly grasped by SWELLOW’s clawed feet, preventing escape.
Name: Swellow

Pokedex Entry: TAILLOW courageously stands its ground against foes, however strong they may be. This gutsy POKéMON will remain defiant even after a loss. On the other hand, it cries loudly if it becomes hungry.
Name: Taillow

Pokedex Entry: SHIFTRY is a mysterious POKéMON that is said to live atop towering trees dating back over a thousand years. It creates terrific windstorms with the fans it holds.
Name: Shiftry

Pokedex Entry: NUZLEAF live in densely overgrown forests. They occasionally venture out of the forest to startle people. This POKéMON dislikes having its long nose pinched.
Name: Nuzleaf

Pokedex Entry: LUDICOLO begins dancing as soon as it hears cheerful, festive music. This POKéMON is said to appear when it hears the singing of children on hiking outings.
Name: Ludicolo

Pokedex Entry: SEEDOT attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. It sucks moisture from the tree while hanging off the branch. The more water it drinks, the glossier this POKéMON’s body becomes.
Name: Seedot

Pokedex Entry: LOMBRE is nocturnal - it will get active after dusk. It is also a mischief-maker. When this POKéMON spots anglers, it tugs on their fishing lines from beneath the surface and enjoys their consternation.
Name: Lombre

Pokedex Entry: LOTAD live in ponds and lakes, where they float on the surface. It grows weak if its broad leaf dies. On rare occasions, this POKéMON travels on land in search of clean water.
Name: Lotad

Pokedex Entry: DUSTOX is instinctively drawn to light. Swarms of this POKéMON are attracted by the bright lights of cities, where they wreak havoc by stripping the leaves off roadside trees for food.
Name: Dustox

Pokedex Entry: CASCOON makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its body entirely with a fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens. This POKéMON prepares for its evolution inside the cocoon.
Name: Cascoon

Pokedex Entry: BEAUTIFLY’s favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. If you want to see this POKéMON, just leave a potted flower by an open window. BEAUTIFLY is sure to come looking for pollen.
Name: Beautifly

Pokedex Entry: Using the spikes on its rear end, WURMPLE peels the bark off trees and feeds on the sap that oozes out. This POKéMON’s feet are tipped with suction pads that allow it to cling to glass without slipping.
Name: Wurmple

Pokedex Entry: SILCOON tethers itself to a tree branch using silk to keep from falling. There, this POKéMON hangs quietly while it awaits evolution. It peers out of the silk cocoon through a small hole.
Name: Silcoon

Pokedex Entry: LINOONE always runs full speed and only in straight lines. If facing an obstacle, it makes a right-angle turn to evade it. This POKéMON is very challenged by gently curving roads.
Name: Linoone

Pokedex Entry: ZIGZAGOON restlessly wanders everywhere at all times. This POKéMON does so because it is very curious. It becomes interested in anything that it happens to see.
Name: Zigzagoon

Pokedex Entry: MIGHTYENA gives obvious signals when it is preparing to attack. It starts to growl deeply and then flattens its body. This POKéMON will bite savagely with its sharply pointed fangs.
Name: Mightyena

Pokedex Entry: At first sight, POOCHYENA takes a bite at anything that moves. This POKéMON chases after prey until the victim becomes exhausted. However, it may turn tail if the prey strikes back.
Name: Poochyena

Pokedex Entry: SWAMPERT is very strong. It has enough power to easily drag a boulder weighing more than a ton. This POKéMON also has powerful vision that lets it see even in murky water.
Name: Swampert

Pokedex Entry: The surface of MARSHTOMP’s body is enveloped by a thin, sticky film that enables it to live on land. This POKéMON plays in mud on beaches when the ocean tide is low.
Name: Marshtomp

Pokedex Entry: The fin on MUDKIP’s head acts as highly sensitive radar. Using this fin to sense movements of water and air, this POKéMON can determine what is taking place around it without using its eyes.
Name: Mudkip

Pokedex Entry: In battle, BLAZIKEN blows out intense flames from its wrists and attacks foes courageously. The stronger the foe, the more intensely this POKéMON’s wrists burn.
Name: Blaziken

Pokedex Entry: COMBUSKEN toughens up its legs and thighs by running through fields and mountains. This POKéMON’s legs possess both speed and power, enabling it to dole out ten kicks in one second.
Name: Combusken

Pokedex Entry: TORCHIC sticks with its TRAINER, following behind with unsteady steps. This POKéMON breathes fire of over 1,800 degrees F, including fireballs that leave the foe scorched black.
Name: Torchic

Pokedex Entry: The leaves growing on SCEPTILE’s body are very sharp edged. This POKéMON is very agile - it leaps all over the branches of trees and jumps on its foe from above or behind.
Name: Sceptile

Pokedex Entry: The leaves growing out of GROVYLE’s body are convenient for camouflaging it from enemies in the forest. This POKéMON is a master at climbing trees in jungles.
Name: Grovyle

Pokedex Entry: TREECKO has small hooks on the bottom of its feet that enable it to scale vertical walls. This POKéMON attacks by slamming foes with its thick tail.
Name: Treecko

Pokedex Entry: This POKéMON wanders across time. Grass and trees flourish in the forests in which it has appeared.
Name: Celebi

Pokedex Entry: Legends claim this POKéMON flies the world's skies continuously on its magnificent seven-colored wings.
Name: Ho-oh

Pokedex Entry: It is said that it quietly spends its time deep at the bottom of the sea because its powers are too strong.
Name: Lugia

Pokedex Entry: Its body can't be harmed by any sort of attack, so it is very eager to make challenges against enemies.
Name: Tyranitar

Pokedex Entry: Its shell is as hard as sheet rock, and it is also very strong. Its THRASHING can topple a mountain.
Name: Pupitar

Pokedex Entry: It feeds on soil. After it has eaten a large mountain, it will fall asleep so it can grow.
Name: Larvitar

Pokedex Entry: Said to be the reincarnation of north winds, it can instantly purify filthy, murky water.
Name: Suicune

Pokedex Entry: Volcanoes erupt when it barks. Unable to restrain its extreme power, it races headlong around the land.
Name: Entei

Pokedex Entry: The rain clouds it carries let it fire thunderbolts at will. They say that it descended with lightning.
Name: Raikou

Pokedex Entry: Anyone who takes even one bite of BLISSEY's egg becomes unfailingly caring and pleasant to everyone.
Name: Blissey

Pokedex Entry: Its milk is packed with nutrition, making it the ultimate beverage for the sick or weary.
Name: Miltank

Pokedex Entry: Each and every time it inhales and exhales, hot embers dribble out of its mouth and nostrils.
Name: Magby

Pokedex Entry: It rotates its arms to generate electricity, but it tires easily, so it charges up only a little bit.
Name: Elekid

Pokedex Entry: Its lips are the most sensitive parts on its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.
Name: Smoochum

Pokedex Entry: If you become enchanted by its smooth, elegant, dance-like kicks, you may get drilled hard.
Name: Hitmontop

Pokedex Entry: It is always bursting with energy. To make itself stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.
Name: Tyrogue

Pokedex Entry: A special fluid oozes from the tip of its tail. It paints the fluid everywhere to mark its territory.
Name: Smeargle

Pokedex Entry: The curved antlers subtly change the flow of air to create a strange space where reality is distorted.
Name: Stantler

Pokedex Entry: This upgraded version of PORYGON is designed for space exploration. It can't fly, though.
Name: Porygon2

Pokedex Entry: It has sharp, hard tusks and a rugged hide. Its TACKLE is strong enough to knock down a house.
Name: Donphan

Pokedex Entry: It swings its long snout around playfully, but because it is so strong, that can be dangerous.
Name: Phanpy

Pokedex Entry: It is said that it usually hides in underwater caves. It can create whirlpools by yawning.
Name: Kingdra

Pokedex Entry: If you are burned by the flames it shoots from its mouth, the pain will never go away.
Name: Houndoom

Pokedex Entry: It uses different kinds of cries for communicating with others of its kind and for pursuing its prey.
Name: Houndour

Pokedex Entry: Its sturdy wings look heavy, but they are actually hollow and light, allowing it to fly freely in the sky.
Name: Skarmory

Pokedex Entry: As it majestically swims, it doesn't care if REMORAID attach to it for scavenging its leftovers.
Name: Mantine

Pokedex Entry: It carries food all day long. There are tales about lost people who were saved by the food it had.
Name: Delibird

Pokedex Entry: It traps enemies with its suction-cupped tentacles then smashes them with its rock-hard head.
Name: Octillery

Pokedex Entry: It has superb accuracy. The water it shoots out can strike even moving prey from more than 300 feet.
Name: Remoraid

Pokedex Entry: It continuously sheds and grows. The tip of its head is prized as a treasure for its beauty.
Name: Corsola

Pokedex Entry: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.
Name: Piloswine

Pokedex Entry: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.
Name: Swinub

Pokedex Entry: The shell on its back is just skin that has cooled and hardened. It breaks easily with a slight touch.
Name: Magcargo

Pokedex Entry: It never sleeps. It has to keep moving because if it stopped, its magma body would cool and harden.
Name: Slugma

Pokedex Entry: Although it is a good climber, it prefers to snap trees with its forelegs and eat fallen BERRIES.
Name: Ursaring

Pokedex Entry: If it finds honey, its crescent mark glows. It always licks its paws because they are soaked with honey.
Name: Teddiursa

Pokedex Entry: Its paws conceal sharp claws. If attacked, it suddenly extends the claws and startles its enemy.
Name: Sneasel

Pokedex Entry: This powerful POKéMON thrusts its prized horn under its enemies’ bellies then lifts and throws them.
Name: Heracross

Pokedex Entry: It swings its eye-patterned pincers up to scare its foes. This makes it look like it has three heads.
Name: Scizor

Pokedex Entry: The BERRIES it stores in its vase-like shell decompose and become a gooey liquid.
Name: Shuckle

Pokedex Entry: To fire its poison spikes, it must inflate its body by drinking over 2.6 gallons of water all at once.
Name: Qwilfish

Pokedex Entry: It is actually timid and easily spooked. If attacked, it flails about to fend off its attacker.
Name: Granbull

Pokedex Entry: Although it looks frightening, it is actually kind and affectionate. It is very popular among women.
Name: Snubbull

Pokedex Entry: Its body has been compressed deep under the ground. As a result, it is even harder than a diamond.
Name: Steelix

Pokedex Entry: It flies straight at its target's face then clamps down on the startled victim to inject poison.
Name: Gligar

Pokedex Entry: When spotted, this POKéMON escapes backward by furiously boring into the ground with its tail.
Name: Dunsparce

Pokedex Entry: Its entire body is shielded by a steel-hard shell. What lurks inside the armor is a total mystery.
Name: Forretress

Pokedex Entry: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The additional weight doesn't bother it.
Name: Pineco

Pokedex Entry: Its tail has a small brain of its own. Beware! If you get close, it may react to your scent and bite.
Name: Girafarig

Pokedex Entry: It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its body to pump up its counterstrike.
Name: Wobbuffet

Pokedex Entry: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.
Name: Unown

Pokedex Entry: It likes playing mischievous tricks such as screaming and wailing to startle people at night.
Name: Misdreavus

Pokedex Entry: It has incredible intellect and intuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.
Name: Slowking

Pokedex Entry: Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.
Name: Murkrow

Pokedex Entry: When agitated, this POKéMON protects itself by spraying poisonous sweat from its pores.
Name: Umbreon

Pokedex Entry: It uses the fine hair that covers its body to sense air currents and predict its enemy's actions.
Name: Espeon

Pokedex Entry: This carefree POKéMON has an easy-going nature. While swimming, it always bumps into boat hulls.
Name: Quagsire

Pokedex Entry: This POKéMON lives in cold water. It will leave the water to search for food when it gets cold outside.
Name: Wooper

Pokedex Entry: If it flaps its wings really fast, it can generate shock waves that will shatter windows in the area.
Name: Yanma

Pokedex Entry: It converts sunlight into energy. In the darkness after sunset, it closes its petals and becomes still.
Name: Sunflora

Pokedex Entry: It may drop out of the sky suddenly. If attacked by a SPEAROW, it will violently shake its leaves.
Name: Sunkern

Pokedex Entry: Its tail is so powerful that it can use it to grab a tree branch and hold itself up in the air.
Name: Aipom

Pokedex Entry: Once it catches the wind, it deftly controls its cotton-puff spores to float, even around the world.
Name: Jumpluff

Pokedex Entry: The bloom on top of its head opens and closes as the temperature fluctuates up and down.
Name: Skiploom

Pokedex Entry: To keep from being blown away by the wind, they gather in clusters. They do enjoy gentle breezes, though.
Name: Hoppip

Pokedex Entry: If POLIWAG and POLIWHIRL hear its echoing cry, they respond by gathering from far and wide.
Name: Politoed

Pokedex Entry: Although it always pretends to be a tree, its composition appears to be closer to a rock than a plant.
Name: Sudowoodo

Pokedex Entry: By keeping still and listening intently, it can tell what is in even wild, fast-moving rivers.
Name: Azumarill

Pokedex Entry: The tip of its tail, which contains oil that is lighter than water, lets it swim without drowning.
Name: Marill

Pokedex Entry: BELLOSSOM gather at times and appear to dance. They say that the dance is a ritual to summon the sun.
Name: Bellossom

Pokedex Entry: The tail's tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.
Name: Ampharos

Pokedex Entry: As a result of storing too much electricity, it developed patches where even downy wool won't grow.
Name: Flaaffy

Pokedex Entry: If static electricity builds in its body, its fleece doubles in volume. Touching it will shock you.
Name: Mareep

Pokedex Entry: They say that it stays still and quiet because it is seeing both the past and future at the same time.
Name: Xatu

Pokedex Entry: Because its wings aren't yet fully grown, it has to hop to get around. It is always staring at something.
Name: Natu

Pokedex Entry: They say that it will appear before kindhearted, caring people and shower them with happiness.
Name: Togetic

Pokedex Entry: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.
Name: Togepi

Pokedex Entry: It has a very soft body. If it starts to roll, it will bounce all over and be impossible to stop.
Name: Igglybuff

Pokedex Entry: Because of its unusual, star-like silhouette, people believe that it came here on a meteor.
Name: Cleffa

Pokedex Entry: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may send out a jolt if amused or startled.
Name: Pichu

Pokedex Entry: The light it emits is so bright that it can illuminate the sea's surface from a depth of over three miles.
Name: Lanturn

Pokedex Entry: It shoots positive and negative electricity between the tips of its two antennae and zaps its enemies.
Name: Chinchou

Pokedex Entry: It flies so silently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.
Name: Crobat

Pokedex Entry: It spins string not only from its rear but also from its mouth. It is hard to tell which end is which.
Name: Ariados

Pokedex Entry: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.
Name: Spinarak

Pokedex Entry: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.
Name: Ledian

Pokedex Entry: It is very timid. It will be afraid to move if it is alone. But it will be active if it is in a group.
Name: Ledyba

Pokedex Entry: Its eyes are specially adapted. They concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.
Name: Noctowl

Pokedex Entry: It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so fast, the movement can rarely be seen.
Name: Hoothoot

Pokedex Entry: It makes a nest to suit its long and skinny body. The nest is impossible for other POKéMON to enter.
Name: Furret

Pokedex Entry: A very cautious POKéMON, it raises itself up using its tail to get a better view of its surroundings.
Name: Sentret

Pokedex Entry: When it bites with its massive and powerful jaws, it shakes its head and savagely tears its victim up.
Name: Feraligatr

Pokedex Entry: If it loses a fang, a new one grows back in its place. There are always 48 fangs lining its mouth.
Name: Croconaw

Pokedex Entry: Its well-developed jaws are powerful and capable of crushing anything. Even its trainer must be careful.
Name: Totodile

Pokedex Entry: If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot that anything that touches it will instantly go up in flames.
Name: Typhlosion

Pokedex Entry: Be careful if it turns its back during battle. It means that it will attack with the fire on its back.
Name: Quilava

Pokedex Entry: It is timid, and always curls itself up in a ball. If attacked, it flares up its back for protection.
Name: Cyndaquil

Pokedex Entry: The aroma that rises from its petals contains a substance that calms aggressive feelings.
Name: Meganium

Pokedex Entry: The scent of spices comes from around its neck. Somehow, sniffing it makes you want to fight.
Name: Bayleef

Pokedex Entry: A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf on its head. It is docile and loves to soak up the sun's rays.
Name: Chikorita

Pokedex Entry: So rare that it is still said to be a mirage by many experts. Only a few people have seen it worldwide.
Name: Mew

Pokedex Entry: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene splicing and DNA engineering experiments.
Name: Mewtwo

Pokedex Entry: A mystical POKéMON that exudes a gentle aura. Has the ability to change climate conditions.
Name: Dragonair

Pokedex Entry: An extremely rarely seen marine POKéMON. Its intelligence is said to match that of humans.
Name: Dragonite

Pokedex Entry: Long considered a mythical POKéMON until recently when a small colony was found living underwater.
Name: Dratini

Pokedex Entry: Known as the legendary bird of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flash of flames.
Name: Moltres

Pokedex Entry: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.
Name: Zapdos

Pokedex Entry: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.
Name: Articuno

Pokedex Entry: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.
Name: Snorlax

Pokedex Entry: A ferocious, prehistoric POKéMON that goes for the enemy's throat with its serrated saw-like fangs.
Name: Aerodactyl

Pokedex Entry: Its sleek shape is perfect for swimming. It slashes prey with its claws and drains the body fluids.
Name: Kabutops

Pokedex Entry: A POKéMON that was resurrected from a fossil found in what was once the ocean floor eons ago.
Name: Kabuto

Pokedex Entry: A prehistoric POKéMON that died out when its heavy shell made it impossible to catch prey.
Name: Omastar

Pokedex Entry: Although long extinct, in rare cases, it can be genetically resurrected from fossils.
Name: Omanyte

Pokedex Entry: A POKéMON that consists entirely of programming code. Capable of moving freely in cyberspace.
Name: Porygon

Pokedex Entry: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature could soar to over 1600 degrees.
Name: Flareon

Pokedex Entry: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10000-volt lightning bolts.
Name: Jolteon

Pokedex Entry: Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.
Name: Vaporeon

Pokedex Entry: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element STONEs.
Name: Eevee

Pokedex Entry: Capable of copying an enemy's genetic code to instantly transform itself into a duplicate of the enemy.
Name: Ditto

Pokedex Entry: A POKéMON that has been overhunted almost to extinction. It can ferry people across the water.
Name: Lapras

Pokedex Entry: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.
Name: Gyarados

Pokedex Entry: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.
Name: Magikarp

Pokedex Entry: When it targets an enemy, it charges furiously while whipping its body with its long tails.
Name: Tauros

Pokedex Entry: If it fails to crush the victim in its pincers, it will swing it around and toss it hard.
Name: Pinsir

Pokedex Entry: Its body always burns with an orange glow that enables it to hide perfectly among flames.
Name: Magmar

Pokedex Entry: Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.
Name: Electabuzz

Pokedex Entry: It seductively wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.
Name: Jynx

Pokedex Entry: With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion that there is more than one.
Name: Scyther

Pokedex Entry: If interrupted while it is miming, it will slap around the offender with its broad hands.
Name: Mr. Mime

Pokedex Entry: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.
Name: Starmie

Pokedex Entry: An enigmatic POKéMON that can effortlessly regenerate any appendage it loses in battle.
Name: Staryu

Pokedex Entry: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and creeks.
Name: Seaking

Pokedex Entry: Its tail fin billows like an elegant ballroom dress, giving it the nickname of the Water Queen.
Name: Goldeen

Pokedex Entry: Capable of swimming backwards by rapidly flapping its wing-like pectoral fins and stout tail.
Name: Seadra

Pokedex Entry: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.
Name: Horsea

Pokedex Entry: The infant rarely ventures out of its mother's protective pouch until it is 3 years old.
Name: Kangaskhan

Pokedex Entry: The whole body is swathed with wide vines that are similar to seaweed. Its vines shake as it walks.
Name: Tangela

Pokedex Entry: A rare and elusive POKéMON that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to get it.
Name: Chansey

Pokedex Entry: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees.
Name: Rhydon

Pokedex Entry: Its massive bones are 1000 times harder than human bones. It can easily knock a trailer flying.
Name: Rhyhorn

Pokedex Entry: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a WEEZING over many years.
Name: Weezing

Pokedex Entry: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.
Name: Koffing

Pokedex Entry: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon's. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.
Name: Lickitung

Pokedex Entry: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning fast volleys that are impossible to see.
Name: Hitmonchan

Pokedex Entry: When in a hurry, its legs lengthen progressively. It runs smoothly with extra long, loping strides.
Name: Hitmonlee

Pokedex Entry: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.
Name: Marowak

Pokedex Entry: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this POKéMON's real face.
Name: Cubone

Pokedex Entry: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an EXEGGCUTE.
Name: Exeggutor

Pokedex Entry: Often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.
Name: Exeggcute

Pokedex Entry: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.
Name: Electrode

Pokedex Entry: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL, they have zapped many people.
Name: Voltorb

Pokedex Entry: The large pincer has 10000 hp of crushing power. However, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.
Name: Kingler

Pokedex Entry: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.
Name: Krabby

Pokedex Entry: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as HYPNOSIS and CONFUSION.
Name: Hypno

Pokedex Entry: Puts enemies to sleep then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams.
Name: Drowzee

Pokedex Entry: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to a diamond, but colored black.
Name: Onix

Pokedex Entry: Under a full moon, this POKéMON likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.
Name: Gengar

Pokedex Entry: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from another dimension.
Name: Haunter

Pokedex Entry: Almost invisible, this gaseous POKéMON cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.
Name: Gastly

Pokedex Entry: When attacked, it launches its horns in quick volleys. Its innards have never been seen.
Name: Cloyster

Pokedex Entry: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.
Name: Shellder

Pokedex Entry: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.
Name: Muk

Pokedex Entry: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.
Name: Grimer

Pokedex Entry: Stores thermal energy in its body. Swims at a steady 8 knots even in intensely cold waters.
Name: Dewgong

Pokedex Entry: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for bashing through thick ice.
Name: Seel

Pokedex Entry: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.
Name: Dodrio

Pokedex Entry: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot speed. Leaves giant footprints.
Name: Doduo

Pokedex Entry: The sprig of green onions it holds is its weapon. It is used much like a metal sword.
Name: Farfetch'd

Pokedex Entry: Formed by several MAGNEMITEs linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.
Name: Magneton

Pokedex Entry: Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses THUNDER WAVE and similar moves.
Name: Magnemite

Pokedex Entry: The SHELLDER that is latched onto SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed on the host's left over scraps.
Name: Slowbro

Pokedex Entry: Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.
Name: Slowpoke

Pokedex Entry: Very competitive, this POKéMON will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.
Name: Rapidash

Pokedex Entry: Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.
Name: Ponyta

Pokedex Entry: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily withstand dynamite blasts without damage.
Name: Golem

Pokedex Entry: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.
Name: Graveler

Pokedex Entry: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.
Name: Geodude

Pokedex Entry: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.
Name: Tentacruel

Pokedex Entry: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.
Name: Tentacool

Pokedex Entry: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.
Name: Victreebel

Pokedex Entry: It spits out POISONPOWDER to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of ACID.
Name: Weepinbell

Pokedex Entry: A carnivorous POKéMON that traps and eats bugs. It uses its root feet to soak up needed moisture.
Name: Bellsprout

Pokedex Entry: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.
Name: Machamp

Pokedex Entry: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
Name: Machoke

Pokedex Entry: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.
Name: Machop

Pokedex Entry: Its brain can outperform a supercomputer. Its intelligence quotient is said to be 5,000.
Name: Alakazam

Pokedex Entry: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close by.
Name: Kadabra

Pokedex Entry: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and TELEPORT to safety.
Name: Abra

Pokedex Entry: An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breast stroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.
Name: Poliwrath

Pokedex Entry: Capable of living in or out of water. When out of water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.
Name: Poliwhirl

Pokedex Entry: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to prefer swimming than trying to stand.
Name: Poliwag

Pokedex Entry: A POKéMON that has been admired since the past for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.
Name: Arcanine

Pokedex Entry: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.
Name: Growlithe

Pokedex Entry: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it is caught.
Name: Primeape

Pokedex Entry: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.
Name: Mankey

Pokedex Entry: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily POKéMON will use psychokinetic powers.
Name: Psyduck

Pokedex Entry: Often seen swimming elegantly by lake shores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.
Name: Golduck

Pokedex Entry: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.
Name: Persian

Pokedex Entry: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.
Name: Meowth

Pokedex Entry: A team of DIGLETT triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.
Name: Dugtrio

Pokedex Entry: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.
Name: Diglett

Pokedex Entry: The dust-like scales covering its wings are color coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.
Name: Venomoth

Pokedex Entry: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. It is attracted by light at night.
Name: Venonat

Pokedex Entry: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.
Name: Parasect

Pokedex Entry: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by drawing nutrients from the bug host.
Name: Paras

Pokedex Entry: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.
Name: Vileplume

Pokedex Entry: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar that is used to attract prey.
Name: Gloom

Pokedex Entry: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.
Name: Oddish

Pokedex Entry: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.
Name: Golbat

Pokedex Entry: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.
Name: Zubat

Pokedex Entry: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.
Name: Wigglytuff

Pokedex Entry: When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.
Name: Jigglypuff

Pokedex Entry: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.
Name: Ninetales

Pokedex Entry: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.
Name: Vulpix

Pokedex Entry: A timid fairy POKéMON that is rarely seen. It will run and hide the moment it senses people.
Name: Clefable

Pokedex Entry: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.
Name: Clefairy

Pokedex Entry: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey's bones.
Name: Nidoking

Pokedex Entry: An aggressive POKéMON that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.
Name: Nidorino

Pokedex Entry: Stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.
Name: Nidoran♂

Pokedex Entry: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.
Name: Nidoqueen

Pokedex Entry: The female's horn develops slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.
Name: Nidorina

Pokedex Entry: Although small, its venomous barbs render this POKéMON dangerous. The female has smaller horns.
Name: Nidoran♀

Pokedex Entry: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.
Name: Sandslash

Pokedex Entry: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.
Name: Sandshrew

Pokedex Entry: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high voltage power.
Name: Raichu

Pokedex Entry: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.
Name: Pikachu

Pokedex Entry: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.
Name: Arbok

Pokedex Entry: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.
Name: Ekans

Pokedex Entry: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.
Name: Fearow

Pokedex Entry: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.
Name: Spearow

Pokedex Entry: It uses its whiskers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.
Name: Raticate

Pokedex Entry: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.
Name: Rattata

Pokedex Entry: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as MAGIKARP.
Name: Pidgeot

Pokedex Entry: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.
Name: Ivysaur
